metadata.synopsis: A U.S. cartoonist (Adolph Green) in Paris meets his daughter's professor (Gérard Depardieu), a fan of his work.

reviews: Resnais and Feiffer make for an odd pairing, as their satire falls almost flat on its face because it lacks wit, charm and sensibility.
The film never ceases to be obnoxious.
I Want to Go Home has a splenetic oddball quality at odds with the evanescent tendencies of Alain Resnais' later films.
